alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 1:13PM CST until November 29 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one half inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 4 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is decreasing in coverage and intensity across this area, and all accumulating snow should end by 4pm at the latest.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
